modName: Soul Gem Chest plus Craftable Azuras Star
summary: Adds a small leveled respawning chest with 5 soulgems to the dragonsreach enchanting table (underneath it) Also adds a crafting recipe for Azura\'s Star. It\'s more of a duplication recipe because it requires Azura\'s Star and 5 empty black soul gems. Gives 2 Azura\'s Stars
descriptionHtml:
The chest is under the dragonsreach enchanting table. It respawns so don\'t put anything in it.
Depending on your level, more powerful gems will spawn. Black souls are the highest. To craft Azura\'s Star, you need azura\'s star and 5 black soul gems. The recipe gives 2 Azura\'s Stars so it is more of a duplication recipe.

Soulgem Spawn Guide:

1    Petty x5
10  Lesser x5
20  Common x5
30  Greater x5
40  Grand x5
50  Black x5

The gems are empty so you can use them as you see fit.

Feedback, Rate, Leave Suggestions and check out my other mods :)
author: Windrider494

files.name: Soul Gem Chest plus Craftable Azuras Star And Black Star
